hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/922103898399a4b16f613d10f77377d38ce2e0e1)

 We have $5\text{ tens}$ and $14\text{ ones}$.

We can put our $14\text{ ones}$ together to make $1\text{ ten}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/283ccaca90351933807b9e04f753f9bf5aa7cccd)

In all, there are $6\text{ tens}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e7acac6ba86582e915cc542fe664fe99499c9425)

$6\text{ tens} + 4\text{ ones}= 64$
